verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Lift up your heads, oh you gates
And let the King of glory come in

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The King is here, no need to fear
In a moment, all sorrows are gone
The King is here, no need to fret
In a moment, all sicknesses are gone

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
With joy, we draw from the well
With joy, we draw from the well of salvation
With joy, we draw, hallelujah
Hallelujah, hallelujah

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
The King is here, no need to fear
In a moment, all sorrows are gone
The King is here, no need to fret
In a moment, all sicknesses are gone

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
With joy, we draw from the well
With joy, we draw from the well of salvation
With joy, we draw, hallelujah
Hallelujah, hallelujah, with joy

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Joy in the Holy Ghost
Joy in the Holy Ghost
Joy in the Holy Ghost
Joy in the Holy
Joy in the Holy Ghost

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Dance in the Holy Ghost
Dance in the Holy Ghost
Dance in the Holy Ghost
Dance in the Holy Ghost
